channel.title: Terra Pkz/skilling. 667 loading 712
channel.description:
[font=times new roman][center][b]Hello everyone, Welcome to Teraa Pkz/skilling. I couldnt think of a name,
I have thought about this, And i will say this i am not the one who made this base, 95% of the matrix team made the base, I have changed and added things to it to make it mine, It was the 667/704 and before you say leach it is now 711.
Crew [B]Deano Melvin[/B]
Updates
-Tuesday 5th of june 2012. I have started this project. -Wednesday 6th of june 2012. I have Worked on the following skills. Woodcutting. Fishing. Thieving. Herblore. -I was thinking of keeping it eco but with pking, so i made it you do ::master and it masters your comabt skills apart from Summoning, I dont think i like the idea, If you want to see it like this and please say so. -Dicing,
features: New Armours. Trainable Combat skills, and working on non-combat skills next few days. New Tokhaar-Kal (Jad cape) Dominion Tower Perfect Switching Overloads, Extremes, Spec Restores and Fully Working Herblore Some what of a Economy Fully working Duel Arena w/Staking Fight Pits Castle Wars Barrows Most Skills Working, More being added Great and Friendly Community All Special Attacks 90% All Spells 90% Fully Working Friends Chat Fully Working Friends List/Private Message Bandos Nex King Black Dragon Saradomin Armadyl Coming Soon Great Donator Benefits Full God Wars Dungeon Corporeal Beast Fully working Spirit Shields w/ there effects All Prayers Fully Working 100% Sounds And 100% music player
Updates to come: Adding custom Jad minigame Adding Fully Working Dung. Adding Bosses to Dominion Tower Adding all aura. Pk System. Adding Jad with Waves re-Writing most skills. Adding Red skin for new players Going to upgrade to 718Cache when i can! Alot more...
media Will come soon, If anyone wants to help me with this project, Add me on skype: deano990 or Private message me on here. Almost at the beta stage, Need a hoster Until i can afford Vps, Credits: Matrix team Me. Anyone who helps.[/b][/center][/font]

item.title: Terra Pkz/skilling. 667 loading 712
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Good luck with this. Also, try and get some pictures out soon, I would love to see the progress on this.

Read full topic

item.title: Terra Pkz/skilling. 667 loading 712
item.dc:creator: @deano990 deano990
item.description:
@deano990 wrote:

[font=times new roman][center][b]Hello everyone, Welcome to Teraa Pkz/skilling.
I couldnt think of a name,

I have thought about this, And i will say this i am not the one who made this base, 95% of the matrix team made the base, I have changed and added things to it to make it mine, It was the 667/704 and before you say leach it is now 711.

Crew
Deano
Melvin

Updates

-Tuesday 5th of june 2012. I have started this project.
-Wednesday 6th of june 2012. I have Worked on the following skills.
Woodcutting.
Fishing.
Thieving.
Herblore.
-I was thinking of keeping it eco but with pking, so i made it you do ::master and it masters your comabt skills apart from Summoning, I dont think i like the idea, If you want to see it like this and please say so.
-Dicing,

features:
New Armours.
Trainable Combat skills, and working on non-combat skills next few days.
New Tokhaar-Kal (Jad cape)
Dominion Tower
Perfect Switching
Overloads, Extremes, Spec Restores and Fully Working Herblore
Some what of a Economy
Fully working Duel Arena w/Staking
Fight Pits
Castle Wars
Barrows
Most Skills Working, More being added
Great and Friendly Community
All Special Attacks 90%
All Spells 90%
Fully Working Friends Chat

Bandos
Nex
King Black Dragon
Saradomin
Armadyl Coming Soon
Great Donator Benefits
Full God Wars Dungeon
Corporeal Beast
Fully working Spirit Shields w/ there effects
All Prayers Fully Working
100% Sounds
And 100% music player

Updates to come:
Adding custom Jad minigame
Adding Fully Working Dung.
Adding Bosses to Dominion Tower
Adding all aura.
Pk System.
Adding Jad with Waves
re-Writing most skills.
Adding Red skin for new players
Going to upgrade to 718Cache when i can!
Alot moreâ€¦
